msbt.message: This island totally relaxes me. Maybe I, like, lived here in a past life?
Do you visit this island a lot? It's pretty fab, right? I've got to come here more often, .
To be all the way honest, I'm so in love with this island I don't want to ever leave,
This island totally relaxes me. Maybe I, like, lived here in a past life?
Do you visit this island a lot? It's pretty fab, right? I've got to come here more often, .
To be all the way honest, I'm so in love with this island I don't want to ever leave,

The old saying is true about diff kinds of air, you know? Air really is très unique in different places.And my voice box is mad loving the air!Maybe this air's exactly what I need to jump-start my pop-star career, ?

She is a lone figure, traveling the world in search of new food, new fashion, and new experiences<10_4 /> Her name? !I'm practicing hosting a travel show. Once I'm famous, I'll totes host all kinds of reality shows, !
Guess what?! I'm moving to this island! Ohmigosh, what if I came here because of, like, fate? Destiny wanted us to meet! Ohmigosh, I'm all CHILLS right now, !

The old saying is true about diff kinds of air, you know? Air really is très unique in different places.And my voice box is mad loving the air!Maybe this air's exactly what I need to jump-start my pop-star career, ?
To be all the way honest, I'm so in love with this island I don't want to ever leave,
Hey! It's nice to meet you! I'm ! You live on this island, right?I'm camping here! Going to kick back and chill on for a bit. Let's hang out while I'm here!
Hi there! I'm ! I'm here on a camping trip! You live on this island? Très cool.It's legit fantastic here! I'm going to be camping for a bit, so let's hang out, !

Hi there! I'm , and I'm totes camping on your awesome island!It's kind of random that I came over to , but I'm way glad I did! This place is the bomb!I'm so jelly of everyone who lives here full-time! Let's hang out while I'm here, . It'll be fun!
Hey! Your fave ison the scene! Thanks for the invite!
Hey! Thanks for inviting me! I was so excited, I just had to zip right over, !
Heeere I am! Thanks sooo much for inviting me, !
It's ! Celebrity in the making! said to come hang!
I'm ! And one of my besties, , invited me to come hang out!
Hi there! I'm ! said, "Come on over!" So, boom! Vacation!
The air here on meshes real well with me. For real. This is great air, .
When it comes to being outdoors, I usually go glamping, because reg camping isn't glam enough.If my camp isn't glamp, then I usually revamp my, um, planp? <10_4 />Sorry, I lost the rhyme there, !
Camping alone is so laid-back. I can do whatever, whenever, you know, ?
The air here on meshes real well with me. For real. This is great air, .
When it comes to being outdoors, I usually go glamping, because reg camping isn't glam enough.If my camp isn't glamp, then I usually revamp my, um, planp? <10_4 />Sorry, I lost the rhyme there, !
Camping alone is so laid-back. I can do whatever, whenever, you know, ?
Is there a word for when the same food you eat at home tastes waaay more delish at a campsite?!Camplicious? Eatdoors? Envirotasty? Ha! No. That one doesn't even make sense, .
This island's vibe is fab-tast-ulous! I'm going to take a ton of selfies and make a scrapbook out of them!

How should I, an aspiring soon-to-be pop star, design my new home?I def have to find a place to buy gold records so I can hang them up and practice having gold records around.And I'll build a stage on the roof! And surround my house with garden gnomes to play my adoring fans!Ohmigosh! I have way too many ideas! I have to start writing these down, .
When I move here, I'll have to check out the scene. Which scene? Well That's the question.I have to find the scene-scene. Then I'll know where the scene is and I'll check it out!
I want to make a bunch of friends and live it up on this island!Do you think there are peeps here who are into pop stars or dancing?
Want to hear some BIG-O news?<10_4 /> I'm going to be living on this island! invited me, and is pretty neat, so I shouted YES, !
Guess what?! I'm going to be living on this island! Full-time! HA! Are you surprised? invited me and I went for it!I'm sooo psyched to part of the celeb life of ! This is going to be fabtaculicious!
Ohmigosh, guess what! invited me to come live on this island! Mondo news, right? I can't wait to get to know everybody!
Hey, want to hear some hot news? Get this<10_4 /> I'm going to be living on this super amazing island!
Sooo guess what? I'm going to be your new neighbor! Now when you see me, you can be all"It's my famous neighbor!" Practice saying that, 'K? Some folks can get tongue-tied when they see celebs.
Ohmigosh, guess what! I decided to move to ! Hi, new neighbor!

Personally? This island is definitely the best island I've ever seen, or heard of, or imagined, or been to.I don't want to oversell it, you know. I can do that sometimes.But I feel like my life would be WAY glam if I lived on an island like this!
We are pretty glam.
Have a safe trip home.
Bluuuurgh Camping here is so fun, I don't want to go home!But, like they say, "Home is where your stuff is." Too bad my stuff isn't here, .
You could move here!
I'll be seeing ya.
The scenery and vibe and general overall fab-osity of this island speak to me so loud I can barely stand it.I could stay on forever and be so happy
Why not stay?
Well, good luck.
I will, thanks. Well, it's going to be totes sad to leave, but I've made a bunch of good memories!I'm glad I came here!
See you later! I'm going tell my friends all about once I'm home, !
I should think about writing a song about my time here!I'm glad I came to even if I didn't get to stay very long. Thanks for everything, !
I can't believe this sweet souvenir was made just for me. The folks on are beyond fab!I bet every day would be le bonkers if I lived here, .
Why not move here?
It's a nice dream.
I never thought I'd take a vacation and be given such fab souvenirs Actually, who WOULD think that?Anyhoo, is the best! I want to have friends as super nice as everyone here is
Stay with us!
We'll still be friends.
I have this fab souvenir to always remember and how sweet everyone here is!But I don't want to go home and remember, . I wish I could stay here for always.
Why not live here?
Have a good flight.
Yeah. I just have to remind myself that my home island is totally as chic as is.
That's right! We may live on different islands, but I'll never forget my time here, !
I will. I hope I come back someday. Maybe on a tour promoting my new album, !
